Advising Syllabus

The adoption of the advising syllabus by academic advisors elevates academic advising as an important, credible, and required educational activity that supports academic success.  For a PDF of the syllabus, please click here: Advising Syllabus.  For the MS Word document to personalize the syllabus to fit your needs, please click here: Advising Syllabus.  Please keep citations and acknowledgements intact.

Many forms are in PDF format.

Academic Advisor Handbook

Full Document (Updated Fall 2019)

By Section

  • Section I
  • Section II
  • Section III
  • Section IV
  • Appendix A
  • Appendix B

Academic & Career Advising

  • Career readiness, in the classroom
  • NACE Competencies.
  • NACADA Clearinghouse (Career Advising)

Online Support Networks

  • NACADA LinkedIn Forum
  • NACADA Clearinghouse (Resources, Journal, Theory-to-practice)
  • NACADA Listserv & Mailing Lists
  • CAS Academic Advising Standards

Advising Reports

  • Cognos reports are available for most commonly requested data. Instructions.
  • Advisee-specific data can be seen in your Portal. Search for “Advising Student Profile” (See “Banner 9 Resources for Advisors” on this page).
  • Unique data beyond these should be requested at advising@laverne.edu (if we cannot retrieve it, we will determine who can).

Early Alert/SOS Guide & Resources

  • Early Alert/SOS Guidebook (Updated: September 2020)
    • Video
  • SOS Website
    • Video

Student Support Resources w/ Tri-City Community Navigators (Part of Tri-City Mental Health)

  • In-person and online support resources to all ULV students.
    • Examples of services:
    • Low-cost medical resources;
    • Mental health and substance use resources;
    • Homeless resources
    • Financial assistance resources
    • Free to low-cost legal resources
    • Support groups
    • Food banks

Students who need assistance can be referred to Tri-City Community Navigators to schedule an appointment in-person or virtually:

  • Contact: Angelica Victoria, avictoria@tricitymhs.org, (888) 436-3246.
 Banner 9 Resources for Advisors

  • Academic Advising Hold (PDF): Advisor removal of the (AAH) in Banner 9 Student Profile.
    • Video
  • Banner 9 Advising Student Profile (in the ULV Portal)

New Academic Calendar – Fall 2021 – LATER

  • Official website
  • Summary Overview (PDF)
  • FAQ (PDF)
  • Terminology (PDF)
  • Video (Key details)
  • Video (Search courses by Session)
Military Connected Advising & Enrollment Expectations
  • Guidelines for enrollment to secure VA benefits
  • Video: Workshop
Honors
  • Honors Program Curriculum and General Education Mapping
    • View Honors Certificate on MyDegree Tracker (PDF).
    • Video overview of the Honors Program.
    • Advising Honors Students (last updated 5/6/2020)
